label: The Changeling
column5: A couple near Tiis Lake was tormented by a changeling
column6: a child swapped by underground beings because their own was not baptized in time; the creature acted wildly leading  a clever girl to trick it by serving a bizarre pudding made from a whole pig
column7: causing the changeling to exclaim in shock and flee forever.

label: A Changeling in Tavistock
column5: A mention of a child stolen away while mother was hanging out the washing - only to be returned after great care was taken of the changeling left in the childs stead.

label: Caerlaveroc
column7: tormented its family with relentless cries and violent behavior until a servant girl discovered its supernatural abilities when left alone. To rid the house of the changeling
column8: she cast it onto burning coals
column9: prompting the fairies to return the real child while the imposter escaped up the chimney laughing.

label: The Strathspey Changeling
column5: One of many stories that suggest blessings and religion hold some sway over the faries - in this case a blessing hinders the little folk in carry the bairn away.
